＃ Canadian and International Human Resources Consulting Services Roster
================================########

## Roster Details

 * **Reference Number**: cb-27-66954611
 * **Amendment Number**: 8
 * **Solicitation Number**: DC-2023-PO-11
 * **Publication Date**: November 30, 2023
 * **Tender Closing Date and Time**: January 16, 2024, at 17:00:00 (local time)
 * **Amendment Date**: January 16, 2024

## Expected Contract Details

 * **Expected Contract Start Date**: April 15, 2024
 * **Expected Contract End Date**: April 14, 2028

## Tender Status and Type

 * **Tender Status**: Expired
 * **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer

## Description of Services

The purpose of this Request for Standing Offer (RFSo) is to identify a roster of qualified providers of Canadian and International Human Resources Consulting Services. The services will be used to support Destination Canada's (*contractingEntityName*) public relations and communications objectives.

## Key Selection Criteria

The selection criteria are as follows:

* Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

## North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA) and its Variants

This RFSo is open to firms participating in the following free trade agreements:

* *North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* *Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* *Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* *Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* *Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* *Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* *Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* *Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* *Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* *World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* *Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* *Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

## Contact Information

For further information, please contact:

Paulina Orozco, Procurement, Destination Canada, 800 – 1045 Howe Street, Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada, V6Z 2A9, Email: [procurement@destinationcanada.com](mailto:procurement@destinationcanada.com), Phone: (604) 638-8372
